title: Boards Summoner Icon
body: How do I change my boards icon? This hasnt been my in game icon in months

replies.body: Your account may need to resync with the boards, which can usually be done by posting somewhere.  It could also be due to a local cache issue depending on what you see compared to us!  What icon do you see, and which have you changed it to?  I'm happy to confirm!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NkvLpBqc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-02T20:06:47.555+0000)
>
> Your account may need to resync with the boards, which can usually be done by posting somewhere.  It could also be due to a local cache issue depending on what you see compared to us!  What icon do you see, and which have you changed it to?  I'm happy to confirm!

I see Cloud 9 2016 Icon, it's been like that for the past two or 3 months of me posting on the boards and I've used the black and red icon that came out early this year for a while. I switch around every month or so (I end up changing it back after a week or two) but ive used the black and red one most consistently and currently it has been my icon for at least a month if not more.
Thanks for the follow up!  I also see the 2016 Cloud 9 icon.  When you have a moment, can you try re-logging into the boards to see if it might update that way?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NkvLpBqc,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-02T20:14:12.973+0000)
>
> Thanks for the follow up!  I also see the 2016 Cloud 9 icon.  When you have a moment, can you try re-logging into the boards to see if it might update that way?

I log in every day because I don't have it save any information. I just re-logged anyway to be sure and it has not changed.

PS: SORRY I lied, I switched to project Ashe icon today but prior to that it was the red one and I think the problem is still relevant, just gave slightly false information.

There may be a delay with the summoner icon updated on here.  I did some tinkering to try and get this fixed up for your specific issue, but it may take a bit of time for the update to go through.  No eta, but hang tight!
Any updates or progress? Sorry to bother you, just curious if it's being addressed or if it's low priority enough' that I shouldn't expect changes any time soon.
I'm really not sure why your boards profile still hasn't updated!  I'll look into this more, and will let you know if I find anything.  Thanks for your patience!

I'm having the same problem, but the Icon is stuck on {{champion:119}}  ever since April 1st. I log onto the boards every day on like 3+ devices, even different browsers sometimes. I would really appreciate some help or an update on the situation for people with these problems.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NkvLpBqc,comment-id=0000000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2016-08-11T16:39:23.442+0000)
>
> I'm really not sure why your boards profile still hasn't updated!  I'll look into this more, and will let you know if I find anything.  Thanks for your patience!

Any news? Sitting on the worlds c9 tier 3 icon now and it still hasnt updated. Guy above this comment is having the same troubles too
Thank you for your persistence on the issue! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NkvLpBqc,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-02T20:22:18.998+0000)
>
> There may be a delay with the summoner icon updated on here.  I did some tinkering to try and get this fixed up for your specific issue, but it may take a bit of time for the update to go through.  No eta, but hang tight!

Thank you very much for your help/concern! :D
Still see the Cloud9 icon, for what it's worth.

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBurs7,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NkvLpBqc,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T15:03:43.104+0000)
>
> Still see the Cloud9 icon, for what it's worth.

Same, I love my team and all but the new icon looks so good, and Im quite tired of looking at this icon, at least let me change it to my other C9 icons x)
